description: Cole Streets and Craig Reynolds turn on the charm in the Backroom; they're both extremely personable, sexy, and comfortable in front of the camera. Even though they are thoroughly into each other they never forget to involve the live audience. They field questions and take suggestions which leads to Craig deep-throating Cole's huge cock, Cole going deep on Craig's juicy bubble-butt, and Cole fucking Craig. It really gets crazy when the athletic equipment comes out. Wait until you see Craig sit down on the baseball bat!
title: Cole Streets And Craig Reynolds, Scene #01
